text:
*Question from the students* :bowtie:

We've asked the students the questions they want us to ask you, which we'll share with you throughout the programme. Here is Q.1:

```What experience at school has been most useful in your career decision making?```

For me, it's a piece of advice that has been useful throughout my working life, rather than for choosing a specific career. It was a time when I was shivering on a cold day at rugby training. Our coach said sport is just like any other profession, you have to learn how to work smarter, not harder. Anyone can be a busy fool running around and working hard, but the best are clever about what they spend their time on. It's still now a difficult mindset to conquer!
